items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful gown
items.body: Itâ€™s a beautiful gown and adjustable because of the back strap. My daughter wore this as her second and less formal gown for her debut. It was long for my 5â€™1 daughter though and I didnâ€™t check if the seller offered customization in length but it was very easy to cut the bottom all around without having to hem it because the type of material doesnâ€™t fray. She did wear a simple petticoat for better shape, my daughter weighs 110 lb 34B 26 in waist so Small (sz 2) fits her perfectly. The only slight issue was the strap, because of how the vines were situated, it did not allow us to adjust it further so we ended up folding and stitching it. Other than that, the gown was perfect and beautiful and most importantly not scratchy. Read more
items.author: Angel R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Company, Customer Service and dress
items.body: I actually cried happy tears the moment I saw it. Not only can I vouch that this is a legit business, I can also tell you what wonderful customer service I received. I was already scammed by a different company and I needed this dress immediately. They got it to me by the time I needed it and the representative was wonderful in reassuring me. The dress itself is stunning, fits perfectly (size chart is right on), I didn't want to take it off. I am so excited for the event I needed it for. If I could give this review 10 stars I would. Thank you ever so much. Read more
items.author: Sara Simonton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: I bought this for my wedding! It was absolutely stunning! Little big though Read more
items.author: Lacie R

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Way too big but very pretty.
items.body: Lovely dress. Loved the color, decent construction for a dress that is worn occasionally. Had to return for a size smaller than suggested & it was still way too big. Needed the shoulder straps to snug up more. Loved the corset in the back but had to pull it as tight as it would go to wear the dress as I didn't have time to return it a second time for another smaller size. Read more
items.author: Misty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality!
items.body: Customer service was great in finalizing sizes. They custom made to my exact sizes. It ended up looking perfect. It was worn for a wedding bridesmaid dress. Read more
items.author: H6759

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth every penny
items.body: I have tried so many gown for mother of bride. This one was my last purchased and won't even look for anything else. Absolutely stunning. I wear the dress. It doesn't wear me. It's so long in back could be a wedding dress. But I showed my daughter and she's all approval of me in it. She's in love with it too Read more
items.author: dawn lafferty

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Returned
items.body: Beautiful but to big, had to return Read more
items.author: Alexis Coomer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal V Neck Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal V Neck Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Olive Green, Fuchsia, Stormy Blue, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Peacock, Baby Blue, Plum, Blush Pink, Lavender, Royal Blue, Light Purple, Teal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
